revision.comment: Removed 88F6281 which is incorrect. This is an Armada 100 not a Kirkwood device.
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=GuruPlug |revision=Display (US Edition) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf_model=003-GD0001 |price=200 |est_release_date=June 2011 |type=plug computer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP168 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=0.5 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT45DB041B |fla2=8 GiB |fla2_brand=Kingston |fla2_model=SD Card |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=E1108AFBG-1E-F |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |jtag=yes,, MicroSD interface |serial=yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1),, |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E3015 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL-2303HX;;1;,,, HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA9981B;;1;,,, HDTV Clock Synthesizer;MicroClock;MK2716S;;1;,,, CEC/I2C-bus Translator;NXP;TDA9950;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9199;;1; |flags=HDMI, MicroSD Card slot, RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.01-rc1;Marvell v1.1.1.1; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.29;Debian 5; |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm) |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=nosoup4u |oui_eth=F0:AD:4E }} :[http://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/p-44-guruplug-display-devkit.aspx Product page]
*[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GuruPlug ''GuruPlug'' on '''Wikipedia''']] *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/guruplug-display ''Guruplug Display'' on '''archlinux|ARM''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88AP168 @800MHz *Video: WMMX2 *Memory: 512MB *Storage: 8GB Internal Kingston MicroSD, 2x External MicroSD Slot *Network 1x Fast Ethernet *USB: 4x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG *Power Source: C7 AC adapter, 100-240V, 50-60Hz
